apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, depicts a tender kiss between two men with a focus on warmth and connection.  The light skin tone is given a soft, natural sheen through Apple's signature realistic lighting and glossy 3D shading, highlighting the gentle curve of their lips meeting. The smooth, rounded edges of the figures create an approachable and heartfelt visual, symbolizing love, affection, and romantic partnership in digital communication.
